block.p: SEIF-William. Of Bronx, NY, on September 21, 2002. Beloved husband of the late Esther (nee Richman). Devoted father of Arthur, Marilyn Golub, Judy and Mona (Jerome) Foreman. Loving grandfather of Amy, Daniel, Andrew (Leslie), Peter (Natalie), Gordon, Alyssa (David), Jason (Angela), Matthew and Michael, and great-grandfather of Daniel. Services will be held at Beth-El Cemetery, Washington Township, NJ, on Sunday, at 2 PM. For information, call ''Gutterman-Musicant,'' 1-800-522-0588.
